name: Halloween bats
description:
Estimated play time: 5~10 minutes

Two bat ponies are celebrating Halloween.

This is my first game made with Godot. I think it's a nice open source engine for 2D games. The game is supposed to be finished before Halloween but I think I procrastinated too much...

Anyway, hope you have fun with this little game! I need to continue my main project now. (´･ω･`)

Music track:
https://opengameart.org/content/catchy-swing
